title: Toggle to Disable Group or DM
body:
This feature gives users the ability to control where their bot operates, allowing them to choose whether it runs in groups or in direct messages (DMs). 

- **Disable for Groups**: When the bot is disabled for groups, it will halt all interactions in group chats. This means the bot will not respond to messages, commands, or any events within group conversations, effectively freezing its activity in that context.

- **Disable for DMs**: Likewise, disabling the bot for DMs ensures that it won't engage in any private messages. The bot will remain inactive in one-on-one conversations unless explicitly enabled.
author: AstroX11
